Running a script

Scripts are run by selecting a script from the Scripts menu.

Or, if a script is broken, you get a nice dialog telling you about the error:

Script View

The set of all scripts can be seen in the Scripts View (use Window > Show View > Other... > Eclipse Monkey > Script View to enable).

Future

Future versions of Eclipse Monkey will offer additional ways to run scripts, such as triggering on changes to a files or other resources, or on specific events (e.g., on team synchronize, or on publish war to app server, etc).
